text: Fire Stick outputs black screen after latest firmware update to version 1.5.2. Audio works but no video display.
Black screen after firmware update suggests display driver issue. Try factory reset Fire Stick to previous firmware version 1.7.4.
Kindle app freezes on loading screen. Fire Tablet 10 HD with 2GB RAM, 64GB storage. Cleared cache twice, still unresponsive.
Kindle app freeze indicates insufficient RAM. Force quit app, clear all cached data, disable background apps, then restart device.
Prime Video app version 6.12.1 crashes immediately on Fire Tablet running Android 13. Error code SSL certificate error displays before crash.
Let's troubleshoot that crash. First, uninstall app completely, reboot Fire TV, then reinstall from app store. Check OS compatibility.
Alexa app won't sync with Echo Dot 4th generation. Device firmware 4.6.4, smartphone OS Android 13. Connection times out.
